thread.title: Yoga Helped Hillary Survive the Benghazi Hearing
thread.title_full: Yoga Helped Hillary Survive the Benghazi Hearing -- The Cut

author: Dayna Evans
title: Yoga Helped Hillary Survive the Benghazi Hearing
text:
"Is it time for yoga yet?" Photo: Christy Bowe/Corbis
After Thursday's marathon eleven-hour Benghazi hearing, 2016 presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton looked hardly worse for the wear, emerging from the hearing with two fists in the air and a triumphant grin like the blonde Rocky Balboa. Though her facial expressions got a workout in the course of the day, Clinton's stamina was seemingly endless. How did she survive being grilled for so long?
Yoga, baby. A Yahoo! News reporter asked what gave the former secretary of state the strength-so-help-her-God to get through the day, and Clinton responded "Yoga always helps." I would say I agree but I keep forgetting to actually go.
http://theticket.tumblr.com/post/131720552077/hillary-clinton-told-yahoo-news-her-yoga-routine
